member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Layout.SfCarousel
member.summary: The Carousel control allows the user to navigate between their items with rich animated UI
member.remarks: Carousel is a in navigator layout that renders list of items in rich UI, based the properties set with the control animate items on navigate. The item has rich customization support and animation will reflected based on the user values.
